message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I believe it has great value and I'm willing to sell it to you for a competitive price. I've taken into consideration the product's worth and I'm starting with a price that reflects its value.
Thank you for considering my counteroffer, Alice. Based on my budget and the value this product brings to me, I'm willing to purchase it for $600000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that my initial price may have been out of your budget, but I believe the product's value warrants a higher price. I'm willing to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial agreement. I'll meet you halfway between my initial offer and your counteroffer.
After reevaluating my budget I'm willing to offer $700000 for the product. I believe this price point aligns more with the value it brings to me.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to increase your price. I'm also willing to be flexible and find a price that works for both of us. I'll lower my price to $1000000, which I believe is a fair reflection of the product's value.
